_comment: Created by EFisher on 25/02/2014 18:26:33 using v2.0
title: How does the way inpatients rate the care they receive vary?
analysis_commentary: In 2012, inpatients were asked to rate their care experience on a zero to 10 scale (0 being a poor experience and 10 a very good experience). 87% of inpatients rated their care with a score of six or above in 2012, which could be compared with rating experiences as good or above in previous surveys, which was 92% of inpatients in 2011.
data_source: Care Quality Commission, Survey of Adult Inpatients and Survey of Outpatients
